name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
title: Tandoori Roast Chicken
desc: The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...\nBut even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

skills.desc:
During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
